entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
